build_command: python -c "import os,subprocess,sys; os.environ['IDS_FILTER']='core_profiles,equilibrium'; outdir=r'{build_cache_dir}'.replace(chr(92), '/'); builddir=r'{build_dir}'.replace(chr(92), '/'); subprocess.run([sys.executable, '-m', 'build', '--outdir', outdir, builddir], check=True)"
install_command: in-dir={env_dir} python -m pip install --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu torch
